projects.title: Recipebox
projects.text: The project offers a simple way to manage your recipe collection. Recipebox utilizes localStorage to store your recipe collection. You can add further recipes, edit existing ones and bookmark your favorites.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.text: A weather app that uses the darksky weather API to display the current weather, a forcast for the week and temperature values over the day. The units can be toggled between SI and Imperial with a click on the degree symbol.

projects.title: Pomodoro
projects.text: Based on the kitchen clock which is also used for the pomodoro technique to manage time intervals of 25min work and 5min breaks. This project features some really impressive pug and stylus function and mixin usage.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.text: The classic Tic-Tac-Toe game. Play a round against the computer and enjoy some neat looking CSS transitions and effects.

projects.title: Quote Generator
projects.text: A simple Quote Generator, that uses the forismatic API to source new quotes. Request random quotes and if you find one you want to share you could use the twitter function.

projects.title: Wikipedia API
projects.text: Search for Wikipedia Entries and display a list of the results using the Wikipedia API or search for a random entry.

projects.title: Twitch API
projects.text: The app uses the Twitch API and features an overview of a selection of streamers and channels. Informations about the online status and what the streamer is playing are visible at a single glance.

projects.title: Simon Game
projects.text: The memory game Simon using the HTML5 Audio tag.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.text: A calculator based on the design of the iphone calculator
